--- title: "2.2 — Cournot Competition — Class Content" execute: freeze: auto --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.callout-note appearance=minimal} # Meeting Date *Thursday, February 23, 2023* ::: ::: callout-warning # Upcoming Assignment [Problem Set 1](/assignment/01-problem-set) (1.1-1.8) is due by 11:59 PM Thursday February 23 on Blackboard Assignments. ::: ## Overview Today we cover our first, and perhaps the most famous and "base" model of Oligopoly: Cournot's model of firms *simultaneously* competing over *quantity.* ## Readings - Ch. 8.1-8.2, 7 in [Church & Ware, 2000](https://works.bepress.com/jeffrey_church/23/) ## Slides Below, you can find the slides in two formats. Clicking the image will bring you to the html version of the slides in a new tab. The lower button will allow you to download a PDF version of the slides. ::: callout-tip You can type h to see a special list of viewing options, and type o for an outline view of all the slides. ::: I suggest printing the slides beforehand and using them to take additional notes in class (*not everything* is in the slides)!

Download as PDF
